About this site

Colophon

Tech Stack

Built with Astro for static-first delivery with selective React hydration for interactive components. 3D hero animation rendered with Three.js. Animations powered by GSAP (ScrollTrigger, Draggable, SplitText). Smooth scrolling via Lenis. Deployed on Vercel.

Typography

PP Editorial New by Pangram Pangram is used for display and headline roles, paired with PP Neue Montreal for body text and UI elements. The serif/sans-serif pairing creates a two-register type system — editorial for impact, geometric sans for readability. Hierarchy is driven by role tokens across scale, line height, and tracking.

Design Language

The prismatic/CMY (cyan, magenta, yellow) chromatic separation is used throughout as a unifying visual language. It appears in scroll reveals, hover effects, the hero animation's temporal RGB split, and the carousel's velocity-driven shadows. This references how white light splits through a prism — a metaphor for breaking a design system into its constituent parts.

Accessibility

This site respects prefers-reduced-motion — all animations are disabled or minimized when the user has requested reduced motion. Navigation is fully keyboard-accessible, the about modal includes a focus trap, and all images include alt text.

Sam Stringer-Hye

Experienced Product and UX/UI designer with 10+ years of crafting intuitive, high-performing digital experiences for top brands. Skilled in designing scalable systems, motion design, and seamless user interactions that bridge creativity and functionality.

Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to bring user-centered solutions to life. Passionate about refining and elevating digital experiences through thoughtful design and problem-solving.
